components.richText:
Welcome to my corner of the web! I'm Elias, and I'm thrilled to have you here.

Ever since I can remember, I've been captivated by the endless possibilities of technology and the boundless realms of creativity. With a deep-rooted passion for Drupal and React, I've embarked on a journey to blend artistry with innovation.

As a consultant, I thrive on the dynamic challenges and opportunities presented by each client engagement. Drawing upon my expertise in [mention your specific field or industry], I collaborate closely with organizations to develop tailored solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and innovation. Whether it's conducting in-depth analysis, devising strategic recommendations, or implementing transformative initiatives, I approach each project with dedication, creativity, and a keen eye for detail. Guided by a commitment to excellence and a passion for problem-solving, I take pride in delivering tangible results that empower my clients to thrive in today's ever-evolving business landscape.

I'm a lifelong learner, always eager to explore new horizons and embrace fresh challenges. Whether I'm coding up a storm, diving into a design project, or strategizing on the soccer field, I find fulfillment in the process of creation.

When I'm not immersed in the world of technology and creativity, you can often find me on the soccer pitch, where the camaraderie of the game fuels my competitive spirit and keeps me grounded. I also have a deep appreciation for health, frequently hitting the gym to stay active and energized.

And when it's time to unwind and reconnect with nature, I trade in my cleats for ski boots, carving up the slopes with exhilarating speed and grace. Additionally, I enjoy the adrenaline rush of paintball battles, where strategy and teamwork are paramount.

At home, I'm accompanied by my loyal companion, Boaz, my Rhodesian Ridgeback. Together, we explore the great outdoors and enjoy life's simple pleasures.

When I was 12 years old, my life took a remarkable turn as my family and I embarked on a journey that led us to the beautiful country of Czech Republic. Leaving behind familiar sights and sounds, we embraced a new culture, language, and way of life. This pivotal experience ignited within me a profound appreciation for diversity and adaptability, shaping me into the resilient and open-minded individual I am today. Embracing every opportunity to learn and grow, my time in Czech Republic has become an integral part of my identity, enriching my worldview and fueling my passion for exploration and discovery.

My linguistic journey reflects the diverse tapestry of my life experiences. Growing up bilingual in English and Danish provided me with a solid foundation for communication, while my time in the Czech Republic introduced me to the intricacies of the Czech language. Additionally, I've dabbled in German, adding another layer to my linguistic repertoire. Beyond these languages, I've also delved into the fascinating world of Esperanto, albeit to a lesser extent. Each language I've encountered has not only expanded my ability to connect with others but has also deepened my appreciation for the richness of global communication.

In addition to my professional endeavors and outdoor pursuits, music has always held a special place in my heart. From the melodic strumming of the guitar to the gentle keys of the piano, and the emotive expression of singing, music allows me to connect with my innermost thoughts and emotions in a profound way. Whether I'm composing my own melodies or interpreting beloved classics, the rhythmic cadence and harmonious blend of notes transport me to a world of creativity and self-expression. Playing guitar, piano, and singing are not just hobbies; they're a vital part of who I am, providing solace, inspiration, and boundless joy amidst life's journey.

Passionate about the intersection of creativity and technology, I'm constantly exploring new ways to innovate and express myself. With a background in JS and React, I thrive on challenges that push the boundaries of what's possible. Whether it's coding elegant solutions, crafting compelling stories, or diving into the latest trends, I'm always eager to learn and grow.

components.title: Parallax Scrolling
components.text: Scroll down the screen to see the objects moving.

components.title: Interactive Parallax
components.text: Move your mouse around to see the cool parallax effect.

components.title: Password generator
components.text: Generate hard-to-guess passwords with one single click

components.title: Duolingo button
components.text: I made this because my friend teased me and said I couldn't make a button that looks like the ones from Duolingo'. ðŸ˜€

components.title: Radial gradient
components.text: This is an interactive radial gradient website, where you can customize sizes, colors, etc.

components.title: Linear gradient
components.text: This is an interactive linear gradient website, where you can customize sizes, colors, etc.

components.title: Crown Clothing
components.text: This is an online clothing store supporting login, signup, adding products to card, and handling fake payments.

components.title: Chrome extension: Czech Vocab
components.text: This chrome extension overrides the default "New Tab", and replaces it with a Czech word and it's definition.

components.title: Game Rules
components.text: Here you can look up the rules for a board/card-game. This project is neither done, nor further developed.

components.title: Another calculator
components.text: Built with pure React JS.

components.title: Chat program
components.text: This is a chat program, that allows the user to login with their Google account, and then chat. It is built with React, Socket, and Firebase. Right now, it doesn't allow new users, so use email "user@example.com" and password "user@example.com" to login.

components.title: Animated counters
components.text: This is a website with animated counters for followers and subscribers on social media.

components.title: Spinning logos
components.text: This is a simple page with a bunch of react logos spinning around.

components.title: Fancy hamburger menu
components.text: This is a hamburger menu with fancy hover and click effects.

components.title: Online calculator
components.text: This online calculator can calculate simple calculations. It is programmed to handle math hierarchy too.

components.title: User form
components.text: This basic user form is a plain form sample that I created in my first month of coding.

components.title: Tracalorie
components.text: This is an app you can use to track all calories you put into your mouth. Every time you eat something, you just type it in there, and it will calculate the total amount for you.

components.title: Task list
components.text: This is a very simple todo app.

components.title: Screen sizer
components.text: This website will show you the exact pixel size of your browser window.

components.title: Portfolio sample
components.text: This is a sample portfolio website that can be an inspiration for others, who need a portfolio.

components.title: Number guesser
components.text: This is a number guessing game where you have to guess the correct number between one and 10.

components.title: Mouse coordinates
components.text: This is a web app that shows the coordinates of your mouse.

components.title: Color
components.text: This is a useless color website where you can choose between various color themes with just one click.

components.title: Reveal IT clone
components.text: This is a clone of 'http://revealit.dk'.

components.title: Github Finder
components.text: This application can be used to search through all Github users.

components.title: Hotel BT
components.text: This is a basic sample website for a tiny hotel.

components.title: Edge Ledger
components.text: This is a sample website for a business company.

components.title: Degree converter
components.text: This degree converter can convert celcius to fahrenheit and opposite.

components.title: Loan calculator
components.text: This online loan calculator can be used to calculate how much money you have to pay back per month, given the loan amount, the interest, and the years to repay.

components.title: Currency converter
components.text: This is a currency converter that can convert Danish crowns to Czech crowns and opposite.

components.title: Book list
components.text: This is a booklist that can be used mainly by librarians to display a list of books, authors, and ISBN numbers.

components.title: Display Writing
components.text: This is a useless app that will show what you write.

components.title: Filedrop
components.text: This is a useless application.

components.title: Chuck Norris joke generator
components.text: This web application can tell you as many Chuck Norris jokes as you wish.

components.title: Background changer
components.text: This is a stupid website that will change background color whenever you move your mouse.
